meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dale Ragus Dan Boehme Norm Burger Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1165.

td.p: Dale Ragus, a real estate broker from New York City, New York
Dan Boehme, a real estate marketing agent originally from New Orleans, Louisiana
Norm Burger, a manufacturing operations specialist originally from Watertown, Massachusetts (whose 2-day cash winnings total $13,801)

tr.td: STARTS WITH "P"
IN THE NEWS
FICTION
LAW
ANATOMY
NAME THAT MUSICAL
